metadata.synopsis: Tut runs his mouth about the trap in Counting House publically, in between drunk talk.
metadata.how_to_trigger: CTY_Main_ATalk to Nine fingers about the Stone Lord;S_LOW_Guildhall_NineFingersef1b7a12-6439-470a-885c-fa47851728cdThen teleport to S_LOW_Guildhall_Visitor_005bf4caace-8ed0-42c4-8b17-a297b80fff9a

0.speaker: Tut Thistlebog
0.text: Come on, Phos, another! Mouth's as dry as Uktar's bloody books.
0.context: NodeContext: Drunk, wheedling your friend into buying you another drink.

1.speaker: Tut Thistlebog
1.text: Guildmaster's buried worse than any foppin' Stone Lord.

2.speaker: Tut Thistlebog
2.text: No, I won't bloody hush, Phos. Told you - I know where the Stone Lord's headed. S'gonna be his grave.
2.context: NodeContext: Drunk, belligerent, waving off a friend who's trying to stop you talking about secret matters quite so loudly.

3.speaker: Tut Thistlebog
3.text: If we was any kind of Guildies, Phos, we'd look after this Stone Lord our own selves.
3.context: NodeContext: Drunk, rambling to a friend who may or may not still be there. A little belligerent on the notion that you want to go off and fight this crime boss who's threatening your guildmaster.
